articles.title: Profound Consolation and Apology Expressed to Bereaved Families of Victims of Construction Accident
articles.content:
Profound Consolation and Apology Expressed to Bereaved Families of Victims of Construction Accident
 Pyongyang, May 18 (KCNA) -- It is the consistent stand of the Workers' Party of Korea and the state to prioritize the interests and conveniences of the people and hold them absolute and protect their lives and properties.
					 But there occurred a serious accident in the construction site in Phyongchon District, Pyongyang on May 13 as the construction of an apartment house was not done properly and officials supervised and controlled it in an irresponsible manner. The accident claimed casualties.
					
					 Right after the accident the state emergency mechanism was put into action to conduct an intensive campaign to rescue survivors, treat the wounded and arrange the scene of the accident.
					
					 The rescue operation came to an end on May 17. 
					
					 Minister of People's Security Choe Pu Il, General Officer of the Korean People's Internal Security Forces Sonu Hyong Chol, Chairman of the Pyongyang City People's Committee Cha Hui Rim, Chief Secretary of Phyongchon District Committee of the WPK Ri Yong Sik and other officials concerned met the bereaved families, citizens in the district and other Pyongyangites to express deep consolation and apology.
					
					 Choe Pu Il said the responsibility for the accident rests with him as he failed to uphold well the WPK's policy of love for the people. He repented of himself, saying that he failed to find out factors that can put at risk the lives and properties of the people and to take thorough-going measures, thereby causing an unimaginable accident.
					
					 With nothing can he atone for the crime he committed against the people and he can never be pardoned, he said, repeatedly expressing deep apology to the bereaved families and other Pyongyang citizens.
					
					 He made a firm pledge to make sure that the Ministry of People's Security becomes a genuine security organ which always protects the interests, lives and properties of the people, true to the party's noble intention of putting the popular masses above all.
					
					 Sonu Hyong Chol said that he was chiefly to blame for the accident as he was in charge of the construction. He expressed heart-felt consolation and sympathy to the victims and the bereaved families and said he was making an apology, his head bent, to other Pyongyang citizens who were greatly shocked by the recent accident.
					
					 The party has always stressed the importance of raising the quality of structure, but he did the construction in a slipshod manner as he did not have the proper stand of serving the people, thus causing such a serious accident, he said, making a solemn determination to do utmost to eradicate the aftermath of the accident and bring the living of the bereaved families to normal as early as possible.
					
					 Cha Hui Rim said that the party has always called on the officials to become genuine and faithful servants of the people but he failed to have the proper control over the construction of the apartment houses as a man responsible for the living of the citizens of the capital city, thereby causing such a serious accident. He has no face to stand before the bereaved families and other Pyongyang citizens and feels deep compunction for them, he said, pledging to make sure that the officials of the Pyongyang City People's Committee do their utmost to alleviate even a little the pain of the victims and the bereaved families and bring their living to normal at the earliest possible date and to prevent the recurrence of similar accident.
					
					 Ri Yong Sik said that seeing for himself the victims in the scene of the accident, he felt as if his heart were falling apart and was too shocked to cry. He added that he could not raise his head for his guilty conscience as he failed to protect the precious lives of the people so much valued and loved by the party.
					
					 He made an apology to the bereaved families and to the citizens in the district again, vowing to come to senses, though belatedly, and motivate the officials in the district to bring the living of the bereaved families to normal, take good care of them, find out every possible cause of accidents and take preventive measures and thus fully guarantee the lives and security of the people.
					
					 Kim Su Gil, chief secretary of the Pyongyang City Committee of the WPK, said that the recent unexpected accident caused damage but there is loving care of our mother party which takes care of all people of the country and relieves their pain, adding that Marshal Kim Jong Un sat up all night, feeling painful after being told about the accident, instructed leading officials of the party, state and the army to rush to the scene, putting aside all other affairs, and command the rescue operation to recover from the damage as early as possible.
					
					 All Pyongyang citizens are sharing sorrow with the bereaved families and victims, he said, adding that the party and the state are taking effective emergency steps to bring the living of the families of victims to normal and provide them with new houses. He called on all to overcome sorrow with courage.

articles.title: Yemeni President Hopes for Korea's Reunification and Economic Progress
articles.content:
Yemeni President Hopes for Korea's Reunification and Economic Progress
 Pyongyang, May 18 (KCNA) -- Abd Rabbuh Mansur Al Hadi, president of the Republic of Yemen, received credentials from Pak Chun Il, DPRK ambassador to his country, on May 7.
					 The president said that the DPRK is a powerful state developed militarily and economically, adding that if Korea is reunified, it will become a power. He expressed belief that Korea would be reunified without fail.
					
					 He sincerely wished the Korean people bigger successes in the efforts for national reunification and economic construction.

articles.title: Cultural Exchange Plan Signed between Governments of DPRK and Bangladesh
articles.content:
Cultural Exchange Plan Signed between Governments of DPRK and Bangladesh
 Pyongyang, May 18 (KCNA) -- A 2014-2019 plan for cultural exchange between the governments of the DPRK and the People's Republic of Bangladesh was signed in Dakha on Wednesday.
					 Present at the signing-ceremony from the DPRK side were DPRK Ambassador to Bangladesh Ri Song Hyon and staff members of his embassy and from the Bangladeshi side the minister of Culture and officials concerned.
					
					 The plan was inked by the DPRK ambassador and the Bangladeshi minister of Culture.

articles.title: 40th Anniversary of Korean Committee for Solidarity with World People Marked
articles.content:
40th Anniversary of Korean Committee for Solidarity with World People Marked
						
 Pyongyang, May 18 (KCNA) -- A meeting took place here on Saturday to mark the 40th founding anniversary of the Korean Committee for Solidarity with the World People.
					 Present there were leading officials of the Committee and members of its Secretariat, officials of public organizations including the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea, the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea and the Democratic Women's Union of Korea, citizens and honorary guests.
					
					 A report and speeches were made at the meeting.
					
					 The reporter and speakers recalled the diverse solidarity activities the Committee has conducted for the last 40 years to ease tension on the Korean Peninsula and achieve its independent and peaceful reunification and ensure peace and stability in Northeast Asia and the rest of the world.
					
					 They said that the Korean people's struggle for national reunification and peace has faced a difficulty due to the touch-and-go situation caused by the unprecedented nuclear war moves of the U.S. and its followers in the Korean Peninsula, the biggest hotspot in the world.
					
					 They called upon the independence- and peace-loving progressives, international democratic organizations, committees for support to Korea's reunification and solidarity organizations the world over to have a correct understanding of the present situation and thus resolutely reject the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK and take active part in the struggle for peace and stability in the Korean Peninsula and Northeast Asia and the rest of the world and the prosperity of mankind.
					
					 The meeting discussed the matters arising in intensifying the solidarity movement with the world people as demanded by the mission of the Committee and the prevailing situation.
					
					 At the end of the meeting, its participants looked round photos showing the activities of the Committee.

articles.title: Title of Merited Artiste Awarded to Ra Yu Mi
articles.content:
Title of Merited Artiste Awarded to Ra Yu Mi
 Pyongyang, May 18 (KCNA) -- Ra Yu Mi, artiste of the Moranbong Band, was awarded the title of the merited artiste of the DPRK, according to a decree of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK promulgated on Saturday.
					 She, armed with the Workers' Party of Korea's Juche-oriented idea of the musical art, made a positive contribution to powerfully arousing the service personnel and people of the DPRK to the drive for implementing the idea of the WPK and upholding the Party's policies by successfully representing the songs reflecting the spirit in Marshal Kim Jong Un's glorious era with ardent creative passion and militant stamina.

articles.title: Training Course for Artistes Held
articles.content:
Training Course for Artistes Held 
 Pyongyang, May 18 (KCNA) -- A training course for the participants in the 9th national meeting of artistes took place here on Saturday and Sunday. 
					 It dealt with the issues for glorifying the immortal leadership exploits leader Kim Jong Il performed in the field of literature and art, thoroughly establishing the Party's monolithic leadership system and bringing about a decisive turn in creation as required by the new historic turning period for the revolutionary cause of Juche. 
					
					 It put main emphasis on the main contents of supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let's Usher in New Heyday of Juche-oriented Literature and Art as Required by Era and Developing Revolution". 
					
					 The basic idea of the work is to implant the party's idea and intention into the minds of the people and motivate all service personnel and people so as to put strong spurs to the revolutionary cause of Juche, the revolutionary cause of Songun by ushering in the new heyday of the development of the Juche-oriented literature and art through the creation of a lot of masterpieces. 
					
					 Kim Jong Un in his work set forth "Let's Uphold the Songun Leadership of the Party by Creating Lots of Masterpieces Like Waterfalls!", the militant slogan to be put up in the field of literature and art.
					
					 The work indicated tasks and ways for ushering in the new heyday of Juche-oriented literature and art as required by the developing revolution. 
					
					 The course referred to the important contents of the leadership exploits Kim Jong Il performed in the field of literature and art and tasks for firmly defending and glorifying them. 
					
					 Through tireless ideological and theoretical activities, Kim Jong Il authored many monumental works for literature and art including "Theory of Cinematic Art," "On the Art of Opera," "Theory of Musical Art," "Theory of Dancing Art," "Theory of Fine Art" and "Theory of Circus" and gave encyclopedic answers to all issues arising in building literature and art. 
					
					 The course stressed the need to thoroughly establish the Party's monolithic leadership system in the field of literature and art and bring about a decisive turn in creation as required by the new historic turning period for the revolutionary cause of Juche.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Discloses Park Geun Hye Group's Anti-DPRK Racket
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Discloses Park Geun Hye Group's Anti-DPRK Racket
 Pyongyang, May 18 (KCNA) -- It is ridiculous that Kim Min Sok, a mere spokesman for the colonial mercenary army, dared slander the dignified DPRK. Great irony is that he was so imprudent as trying to justify his provocative remarks while pulling up the DPRK over its "human rights" and "freedom". Rodong Sinmun Sunday says this in an article. 
					 The article goes on:
					
					 The DPRK is a people's country established on the initiative of all Korean people. However, there exists in south Korea the puppet regime without any sovereignty which was established by the U.S at the point of bayonet. A "country" where the aggression forces swagger about under the U.S. domination is south Korean society deplored by its people. It is self-evident that genuine human rights cannot be ensured in the land where dignity and sovereignty are trampled down by outside forces. 
					
					 South Korea is the tundra of human rights and freedom as it is ruled by the Park Geun Hye group seeking only its wealth and pleasures, indifferent to the lives of the people. 
					
					 Nevertheless, the puppet military group is pulling up the DPRK over its "human rights and freedom". Lurking behind this is its sinister intention to get on the nerves of the DPRK and escalate tensions in a bid to tide over the worst ruling crisis caused by the ferry Sewol disaster. 
					
					 The puppet group driven into a tight corner tries to raise the "north wind" to get rid of the crisis and find a way out by floating a "rumor about nuclear test" of the DPRK and announcing the investigation results that the "north was involved in the drone case". 
					
					 No matter how frantically the Park group is keen on the anti-DPRK campaign, vociferating about "human rights" and "freedom", it can not tarnish the dignified image of the DPRK and cover up its sinister intention.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Massive Resistance to Punish Park Geun Hye Group
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Massive Resistance to Punish Park Geun Hye Group
						
 Pyongyang, May 18 (KCNA) -- 34 years have passed since the Kwangju Popular Uprising in south Korea.
					 The uprising was a heroic resistance to stand against the U.S. colonial domination over south Korea and military fascist dictatorship and realize the desire for independence, democracy and reunification.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun on Sunday says in a commentary:
					
					 The Korean people are looking back upon the heroic struggle and brilliant feats of the uprisers who recorded a page in the history of the just struggle of the south Korean people. And they are expressing the surging resentment at the U.S. and the south Korean puppet military gangsters who covered the whole of Kwangju City with blood and corpses of uprisers and innocent people.
					
					 The aspiration and desire of the people for independence, democracy and reunification are being trampled down in south Korea ruled by the descendants of the "yusin" dictatorship.
					
					 As the ferry Sewol disaster showed, south Korea is turning into a veritable hell in which the working people cannot live at ease even a moment due to the unpopular rule of the Park Geun Hye group.
					
					 If the moves of the Park group are allowed, the south Korean people will undergo bigger humiliation and meet greater disgrace by the foreign forces. And the second and third ferry Sewol disaster will occur and the people will suffer bigger misfortune under the shuddering fascist dictatorship and the treacherous unpopular rule.
					
					 Only when the south Korean people rise up as one in the massive anti-"government" resistance by inheriting the spirit of the Kwangju resistance uprisers, can they smash the U.S. colonial domination and the Park Geun Hye group's treacherous rule and realize their desire for independence, democracy and reunification.
					
					 The people of all social strata in south Korea should resolutely punish the puppet group swimming against the era and the people's mindset and committing monstrous crimes against the nation.

articles.title: Rescue Operation for Victims of Ferry Sewol Sinking Disaster Interrupted in S. Korea
articles.content:
Rescue Operation for Victims of Ferry Sewol Sinking Disaster Interrupted in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, May 18 (KCNA) -- South Korean KBS on May 14 exposed that a rescue operation for the victims of the ferry Sewol sinking disaster was interrupted due to a ceremony for puppet public officials.
					 A lawmaker from the Democratic Alliance for New Politics on the same day opened to public telephone call records between the room 119 of agency for firefighting and disaster prevention and the Mokpho maritime police right after the occurrence of the accident.
					
					 According to the records, the chief of the room forced the maritime police to direct primary efforts to offering convenience to bureaucrats who came to meet the victims.
					
					 The lawmaker charged that the room gave priority to holding a ceremony for showing high-ranking officials those rescued, not to rescuing the victims.
					
					 The call records will spark off great furor in the future as they showed why the society for public officials should be changed, KBS reported.

articles.title: Investigation into Police's Abuse of Power Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Investigation into Police's Abuse of Power Demanded in S. Korea 
 Pyongyang, May 18 (KCNA) -- The Citizens Solidarity for Democratic Society of south Korea on May 15 filed a suit to the Seoul Central District Prosecutor's Office against the director and vice-director of the Police Agency and the director of the Seoul Metropolitan Police Agency for giving instructions to block the protests as regards the ferry Sewol sinking accident. 
					 A few days ago the bereaved families paid a protest call to KBS which insulted the victims of the sinking accident and next day they headed for Chongwadae to meet Park Geun Hye and a lot of citizens joined them. 
					
					 The police cracked down on them for the mere reason that they were putting in mourners' clothes or putting up slogan boards. 
					
					 On April 20, the police blocked the bereaved families of the victims trying to go to Chongwadae to meet Park in protest against the delayed rescue operations for those missing. 
					
					 The vice-director of the Police Agency tried to disperse the bereaved families, blaring that it is illegal to go to Seoul. 
					
					 It was reported that later the director of the Police Agency admitted by himself that it was done by his order. 
					
					 The Citizens Solidarity for Democratic Society indicted those responsible for it to the prosecution, terming such suppression by the police abuse of power and violation of human rights. 
					
					 Meanwhile, the organization submitted to the Police Agency and the Human Rights Committee a written request on investigating abuse of power and violation of human rights by the police.
					
					 The written request said the police should stop treating ordinary people as criminals without fail, demanding a certain investigation into the police's suppression, punishment of those responsible for it.

articles.title: Punishment of Arch Criminal of Ferry Disaster Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Punishment of Arch Criminal of Ferry Disaster Demanded in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, May 18 (KCNA) -- The Citizens Solidarity for Democratic Society held a press conference in Jongro District, Seoul on May 14 at which it demanded the punishment of those responsible for the ferry Sewol sinking accident, according to south Korean KBS.
					 At the press conference speakers stressed the need to make a thorough-going investigation into those responsible for the ferry disaster and take measures to prevent recurrence of similar accidents.
					
					 Then the participants submitted a bill on the disaster to the Board of Audit and Inspection.

articles.title: Moves to Calm Down Public Criticism Censured in S. Korea
articles.content:
Moves to Calm Down Public Criticism Censured in S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, May 18 (KCNA) -- MBC of south Korea on May 12 denounced the puppet political camp for trying to calm down strong public criticism as regards the ferry Sewol sinking disaster. 
					 Nearly a month has passed since the accident but public opinion obsessed by sense of collapse and loss and indignation remained unchanged, it said, and went on:
					
					 It is as clear as noonday that such public opinion will be a burden to the "government" and ruling party with the elections to local self-governing bodies at hand.
					
					 It disclosed that there are some signs of trying to change such public opinion in favor of them, adding that it may have a reverse effect on them.

articles.title: Probing into Truth about Accident and Prevention of Recurrence Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Probing into Truth about Accident and Prevention of Recurrence Demanded in S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, May 18 (KCNA) -- A south Korean religious organization held a meeting in Ansan, Kyonggi Province on May 13 to denounce the puppet authorities' behavior as regards the ferry Sewol sinking accident, according to south Korean CBS.
					 Speakers charged that everything done by the "government" ranging from the maritime police to the Ministry of Security Administration and the "president" as regards the ferry sinking accident ended in failure.
					
					 They condemned the Chonghaejin Marine Transportation Company which owned the ferry for seeking only to fill its own purse.
					
					 The accident was caused by greed for money and injustice, they said, demanding the authorities probe the truth about the accident and take measures to prevent recurrence.

articles.title: S. Korean Business Obsessed by Money-making Accused
articles.content:
S. Korean Business Obsessed by Money-making Accused
						
 Pyongyang, May 18 (KCNA) -- A suspicion about a business of south Korea involved in rescuing the ferry Sewol is increasing day by day, according to south Korean KBS on May 5.
					 The fact that the business had an absolute monopoly on the rescue of the ferry through the mediation of the maritime police is sparking arguments of various circles.
					
					 It has been confirmed that the course of the business's signing a contract for rescuing the ferry was contrary to procedures of a law.
					
					 KBS accused the business for busying itself with signing a rescue contract at a time when even a survivor should be rescued.

articles.title: False Reports about Ferry Sewol Disaster Slammed
articles.content:
False Reports about Ferry Sewol Disaster Slammed
						
 Pyongyang, May 18 (KCNA) -- The south Korean newspaper Hangyore on May 13 carried an editorial "It is urgent to rescue sinking public broadcasting service". 
					 The bereaved families of the victims of the ferry Sewol disaster demanded an immediate resignation of the president of KBS who failed to report the truth about the accident while reading the face of power, the editorial said, and went on:
					
					 Journalists belonging to the KBS Journalists Association also demanded the resignation of the president. 
					
					 121 journalists of MBC released an apology statement on their false report about the accident and journalists of the broadcasting services in 18 regions called for independence of news report.
					
					 Employees of KBS denounced its president as a "person unsuited for the president of public broadcasting service," an indication how serious illness the broadcasting service is suffering from.
					
					 The news director of KBS unhesitatingly insulted the bereaved families as "hooligans" and another high-ranking official blared that "why will I pay a consolation visit? It is not necessary to express consolation for such persons."
					
					 These senseless behaviors made the public broadcasting service the one yielding to the regime. 
					
					 If the public broadcasting service is not saved from the danger of sinking, it will be forsaken by the people forever.

articles.title: Acceptance of Demand of Families of Those Missing Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Acceptance of Demand of Families of Those Missing Called for in S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, May 18 (KCNA) -- Students of Hanshin University and a theological seminary Thursday held a haircutting ceremony in the Central District, Seoul at which they demanded the Park Geun Hye group accept the demand of the families of those missing due to the ferry Sewol sinking disaster, according to the south Korean internet newspaper Voice of People.
					 At the ceremony students charged that the ferry Sewol sinking disaster occurred as the "government" did not rescue it.
					
					 They said that they would launch a hunger strike with the beginning of haircutting with the families of those missing.
					
					 They noted that they would fight it out until their three-point demand "unconditionally accept the demand of the bereaved families", "present cabinet must resign" and "the president should take responsibility for the disaster" is met.
					
					 Then a proposal to all theological students was read out.

articles.title: Punishment of Murderous Enterprisers Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Punishment of Murderous Enterprisers Demanded in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, May 18 (KCNA) -- An editorial titled "Institution of law on punishing murderous enterprises that brooks no further delay" was posted by the south Korean internet newspaper Voice of People on Friday.
					 The editorial said that the prosecution put in custody and indicted the caption and 15 crewmen of the ferry Sewol.
					
					 It noted that their behavior was unpardonable in light of morality but the management side was not indicted though it was chiefly to blame for the accident.
					
					 It has been a practice that the owner of an enterprise goes unpunished but employees are punished when serious accidents occur, it said, and went on:
					
					 Now in south Korea six workers every day and more than 2 000 workers in a year die due to industrial disasters but owners of enterprises go unpunished or pay some fines.
					
					 It is not right to hold field manager responsible for accidents and not punish owners of enterprises and the management side.
					
					 The ferry Sewol sinking disaster occurred as the owner bought the old ferry, rebuilt it on an expansion basis at random and loaded cargos exceeding those reported. This is impossible if there is no instruction of the management side.
					
					 Such acts are a deliberate murder. It is necessary to institute a law to punish such guys as soon as possible.

articles.title: Koreans in China Slam Park Geun Hye Group
articles.content:
Koreans in China Slam Park Geun Hye Group
 Pyongyang, May 18 (KCNA) -- The Federation of Korean National Economic Workers in China issued a statement on May 15 under the title of "We will resolutely smash the last-ditch efforts of the Park Geun Hye group".
					 The statement said that Kim Min Sok, the spokesman for the puppet Ministry of Defense of south Korea, let loose a string of invectives against the DPRK.
					
					 The statement went on:
					
					 The reckless remarks let loose by the Park group is a mad act aimed to launch an all-out confrontation with the DPRK with a stupid calculation to get rid of the overall crisis caused by dependence on foreign forces and acts of treachery and escape miserable defeat in the forthcoming local election.
					
					 We warn once again the Park group to ponder over unimaginable consequences to be entailed by wordplay of such idiots as Kim Min Sok.
					
					 The south Korean people should turn out as one in the struggle for sweep away Park and her stooges who are bringing untold misfortune by escalating confrontation with the north, indifferent to the grief and resentment of the people, not content with turning south Korea into a mourner's house.
					
					 The federation and all its members will rise up together with the people in the homeland as one in the struggle for wiping out all the heinous provocateurs trying to bring down the DPRK.

articles.title: Niigata Prefectural Liaison Council for Japan-Korea Friendship Formed
articles.content:
Niigata Prefectural Liaison Council for Japan-Korea Friendship Formed
 Pyongyang, May 18 (KCNA) -- The Niigata Prefectural Liaison Council for Japan-Korea Friendship was inaugurated with due ceremony on May 11.
					 Present there were personages of various circles in the prefecture and officials of the Niigata Prefectural Headquarters of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan.
					
					 Speakers referred to the significance of the formation of the council and its action orientation.
					
					 A congratulatory message sent by the Korean Society for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries was read out. Then followed a lecture.
					
					 Fumitoshi Yoshizawa and Kunihiko Kawamura were elected representative members and Zunya Arita secretary general.
					
					 The ceremony adopted an appeal calling upon people of all social standings of Japan to turn out in the movement to expand exchange with the DPRK.

articles.title: Korean Young People in Japan Launch Action for Immediate Application of Tuition-free Program
articles.content:
Korean Young People in Japan Launch Action for Immediate Application of Tuition-free Program
						
 Pyongyang, May 18 (KCNA) -- Members of the Korean Youth League in Japan conducted street information activities from April 16 to 27 in demand of an immediate application of the tuition-free program for senior high schools to Korean schools.
					 The Hyogo and Hiroshima headquarters of the league conducted signature campaigns in streets several times.
					
					 Members of the league in Tokyo, Osaka, Kanagawa, Chiba, Saitama and Aichi conducted signature campaigns at railway stations and in streets, chanting slogans of "Immediately apply tuition-free program to our students!" and "Ensure equal right to learning!"
					
					 They expressed the will to fight it out to defend the future of the Korean schools and Korean compatriots community, expressing resentment at the Japanese authorities' ceaseless moves for stamping out the national education, 66 years since the April 24 struggle for education.
					
					 Meanwhile, Japanese who took part in the signature campaigns said:
					
					 The students' right to learning should be ensured regardless of the state-to-state issue. It is a shame of a member of the international community that the Japanese government is discriminating against the Korean nation.

articles.title: Cuadros expresan condolencias a familiares de damnificados y piden disculpas a capitalinos
articles.content:
Cuadros expresan condolencias a familiares de damnificados y piden disculpas a capitalinos
Pyongyang, 18 de mayo (ACNC) -- El Partido del Trabajo de Corea y el Estado mantienen la invariable politica de absolutizar y dar prioridad a los intereses y comodidades de los habitantes y proteger consecuentemente la vida y las propiedades de ellos.
					Sin embargo, ocurrio el dia 13 en el campo de construccion de un apartamento del capitalino municipio de Phyongchon un accidente grave con saldo de perdidas humanas debido a la irresponsabilidad de los funcionarios que construyeron con chapuceria las viviendas para los habitantes y no supervisaron debidamente esta obra.
					
					Tan pronto como ocurriera el accidente, entro en operacion el aparato estatal de medidas emergentes y se libro una operacion intensa para rescatar a los sobrevivientes, tratar a los heridos y ordenar el terreno.
					
					El ministro de Seguridad del Pueblo, Choe Pu Il, el general del Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de Corea, Sonu Hyong Chol, el presidente del Comite Popular de la Ciudad de Pyongyang, Cha Hui Rim, el secretario responsable del Comite del PTC en el citado municipio, Ri Yong Sik, y otros cuadros se reunieron el dia 17 en el lugar del accidente, donde termino ya la operacion de rescate, con los familiares de victimas, los moradores de dicho municipio y otros capitalinos y les expresaron profundas condolencias y les pedieron disculpas.
					
					Choe Pu Il dijo que la responsabilidad del presente accidente recae sobre el mismo que no acato bien la politica de amor al pueblo del PTC. 
					
					Reflexiono de su error que causo el accidente inimaginable por no haber buscado a tiempo los factores peligrosos para la vida y los bienes del pueblo ni tomado las medidas consecuentes para eliminarlos de antemano.
					
					Volvio a pedir disculpas a los familiares y los ciudadanos diciendo que su crimen cometido ante el pueblo no puede ser remunerado ni perdonado.
					
					Tomo la firme decision de dedicar todo lo suyo, en acato al noble proposito del partido que concede primacia a las masas populares, por hacer del MINSEP el organo verdadero que siempre defiende consecuentemente los intereses, la vida y los bienes del pueblo.
					
					Sonu Hyong Chol reconocio que el responsable principal del accidente es el mismo que se ha encargado de la obra.
					
					Expreso profundo pesar y consuelo a los damnificados y sus familiares y pidio disculpas con la cabeza inclinada tambien a los capitalinos conmocionados por el accidente.
					
					Si bien el partido instruye tanto elevar la calidad de las construcciones, he causado este accidente grave por haber ejecutado con chapuceria la obra, confeso y juro solemnemente hacer todo lo posible para eliminar cuanto antes las perdidas y estabilizar la vida de los familiares de victimas.
					
					El presidente del Comite Popular de la Ciudad de Pyongyang, Cha Hui Rim, dijo que el Partido siempre enfatiza a los funcionarios que sean servidores fieles al pueblo, pero el mismo no controlo bien la construccion de viviendas siendo encargado de vida de los ciudadanos, lo cual engendro el recien accidente grave.
					
					Dijo que no tiene cara para pedir disculpas a los familiares de victimas y los habitantes ciudadanos y se decidio a hacer todo lo posible para que los funcionarios del comite popular alivien, aunque sea minimo, el dolor de los danados y sus familiares y estabilicen cuanto antes la vida de ellos y no surjan mas otra tragedia semejante.
					
					El secretario responsable del PTC en el municipio de Phyongchon, Ri Yong Sik senalo que al ver a las victimas con sus propios ojos, sentia muy apenado y agrego que no podia alzar la cabeza por el sentimiento de culpabilidad de no haber protegido la preciosa vida de los habitantes tan amantes por el Partido.
					
					Pidio disculpa otra vez a los familiares de victimas y a los habitantes de su municipio y manifesto su decision de movilizar a los  funcionarios municipales para estabilizar y cuidar bien la vida de los familiares de victimas, tomar las medidas para buscar todos los elementos accidentales y asegurar cabalmente la vida y seguridad de los habitantes.
					
					El secretario responsable del Comite del Partido en la ciudad de Pyongyang, Kim Su Gil recalco que aunque surgio el dano debido al inesperado accidente, nos atiende el Partido madre que elimina hasta el dolor del corazon de todo el pueblo del pais.
					
					Se refirio a que al informarse del presente accidente, el Mariscal Kim Jong Un no durmio toda la noche sintiendose muy apenado por el caso y ordeno a todos los cuadros del Partido, el Estado y el Ejercito organizar ante todo la campana de socorro y dio las instrucciones detalladas orientadas a liquidar cuanto antes los danos concernientes.
					
					Subrayo que ahora todos los pyongyaneses comparten la tristeza con los familiares de victimas y los damnificados y se toman las medidas urgentes del Partido y el Estado destinadas a estabilizar la vida de las familias de victimas y ofrecerles nuevas viviendas.
					
					  Finalmente exhorto a levantarse con animo como un solo hombre superando tal tristeza.

articles.title: Otorgado a Ra Yu Mi titulo de Actriz Benemerita
articles.content:
Otorgado a Ra Yu Mi titulo de Actriz Benemerita
Pyongyang, 18 de mayo (ACNC) -- Segun el decreto del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea publicado el dia 17, fue otorgado el titulo de Actriz Benemerita a la cantante de la Banda Moranbong, Ra Yu Mi.
					Armada con firmeza con la autoctona idea de musica y arte del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y con la pasion creadora y el temperamento combativo, ella canto bien las canciones que reflejan  el espiritu de la gloriosa epoca de Kim Jong Un y contribuyo a llamar energicamente al ejercito y el pueblo de Corea a la campana por materializar la idea del partido y defender la politica del partido.
